required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on October 07, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Patients Perspectives on Discontinuation of Their Fertility Treatment Due to the COVID-19 Pandemic
clinical_study.official_title: Patients Perspectives on Discontinuation of Their Fertility Treatment Due to the COVID-19 Pandemic

primary_outcome.measure: Patients perspectives on the abruptly discontinuation of their fertility treatment by using a questionnaire
primary_outcome.time_frame: During the COVID-19 pandemic, from March 2020 till June 2020

primary_outcome.measure: Patients reproductive behaviour by using a questionnaire
primary_outcome.time_frame: During the COVID-19 pandemic, from March 2020 till June 2020

primary_outcome.measure: Patients views on resuming fertility treatment by using a questionnaire
primary_outcome.time_frame: During the COVID-19 pandemic, from March 2020 till June 2020

intervention.description: Eligible patients will be selected electronically from our database and digital agenda. After selection, patients will be contacted via email to participate. Two reminders will be send in case the questionnaire is not filled out: a first reminder after one week, a second reminder after two weeks.

study_pop.textblock: Patients whose fertility treatment was discontinued abruptly due to the COVID-19 pandemic
